Everyone is welcome to come enjoy our amazing views, drinks and light bar food fare. We have plenty of seating for groups large or small and welcome families. Our friendly service and lively atmosphere will keep you coming back! Tampa Bay Areas #1 Rooftop Bar Best Sunset Views on Clearwater Beach COLD DRINKS , GOOD FOOD & GREAT VIBES Jimmy’s Crows Nest is located on the 10th floor of Pier House 60 Marina Hotel next to Clearwater Marina and across the street Pier 60 and one of the best beaches in the U.S., Clearwater Beach. Everyone is welcome to come enjoy our amazing views, drinks and light bar food fare. We have plenty of seating for groups large or small and welcome families. Our friendly service and lively atmosphere will keep you coming back! Bask in a 270-degree view of the sun setting over a white sugar sand beach, the sparkling waters of the Gulf of Mexico, award-winning Pier 60 and the emerald colors of Clearwater Marina waters. Located on the 10th floor of Pier House 60 Hotel , Jimmy’s Crow’s Nest Rooftop Bar is a must-see when visiting Clearwater Beach! Hours
